website_summaries.verdict: 100% natural and tasty, these supplements repair and support joints and cartilage to help maintain mobility in a liquid form as opposed to a chew.
pros: Dogs with arthritis or joint issues become more active, agile, and seem to sleep more comfortably with use
Overall, some dogs appear to have more "pep in their step."
cons: may need a pump to dispense product, which isn't included
Not good for dogs who are allergic to shellfish

customer_reviews.title: Check Ingredients! TOXIC combination!!
customer_reviews.text: To all dog lovers. Please remember that the combination of sodium benzonate and citric acid (or ascorbic acid/Vit C) is TOXIC. It causes benzene, which is a cancer causing chemical associated with leukemia and other blood cancers. Please be a well informed pet parent and study the ingredients before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Laika

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this product and it works well with ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product and it works well with my dog but I noticed on my recent purchase the color of the liquid supplement is very dark brown instead of the usual clear yellow solution. The ingredients are the same. I've been monitoring my dog after treatments and so far he has no positive reaction yet. Just curious why the change of color?
customer_reviews.author: jotzxoox

customer_reviews.title: What was delivered is not what is advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what i got, but it is a white blank bottle with the words Best Hip and Joint Supplement for dogs. There is no label. There is nothing that says Terramax. There are not directions. I don't know what this product is, but I am scared to give it to my dog, because I have no idea what this is. I am returning this. I will go to the store and buy it directly so I know what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Socal otobabe

customer_reviews.title: I can already tell a big difference after the first week!
customer_reviews.text: My tiny chihuahua had been having trouble in his back legs and nothing was working from the vet. After reading all the great reviews, I decided to try TerraMax. I doubled the dose to start according to the seller to see faster results and boy did I! He is up walking on both back legs and running circles around me. Playing with his toys again. I am so happy. And he must be! He is also having his bm's without difficulty. It was harder to get in position when he was in pain. This is a very very wonderful product. Please don't let your baby suffer. Order it today and start right away!
customer_reviews.author: cindy e.

customer_reviews.title: No label and no instructions
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a white bottle with no label whatsoever. This could be anything inside of it and how would I know the difference or trust to give it to my dog? Not sure if this is a generic product but I am not happy about it. How would I even know what the safe dosing is?
customer_reviews.author: nila k.

customer_reviews.title: Worked miracles for our Dixie.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few weeks before giving this product a review. My elderly Shitzu is a new dog since we have been giving her this wonderful product. We were amazed the first time we turned around and she was standing behind us after climbing the stairs from the den to the kitchen. She has never been able to do this. When she gets up in the morning, she bounces around like a puppy. This little dog was dumped in the river behind our house and the vet didn't have any hope that she would survive. Love and TerraMax have made all the difference! Highly, Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!
customer_reviews.text: My 50lb 11 yr old collie Sheppard mix began experience pain standing up, climbing stains and started to walk very slowly. My vet prescribed anti-inflammatory tablets and suggested adding a strong supplement to his diet. Upon researching the vast supplement brands I decided on a liquid which would be easily digestible. I was impressed By TerraMax Pro reviews. My old guy has been taking TerraMax Pro for 3 weeks now and the result is amazing! He’s no longer limping up the stairs, having trouble standing, and on our daily walks he’s prancing like a young adult again. My Vet is very impressed with his improvement and suggested I discontinue use of the daily anti-inflammatory tablets. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gar Scotti

customer_reviews.title: May be effective f dog took it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a liquid rather than pills because my three year old shih tzu is extremely finicky and administering pills is next to impossible He needs two teaspoons of this liquid for his weight. I presented it in one of his Small bowl. I tried to pour some of it on his food. I tried administering directly with a syringe. Absolutely nothing will do. He has not has a single dose of it since it arrived several days ago and I have tried daily. So keep that in mind if your dog is finicky I clearly wasted money
customer_reviews.author: anonyme

customer_reviews.title: Seizures
customer_reviews.text: Added this as a supplement for our 12 year old lab. After just three doses he practically ran to the park but then started having seizures. I saw at least 5 seizures in 24 hours. We cut him off this supplement immediately and within 24 hours he was done with seizures. Never had a seizure before or after this situation. Be very careful with this supplement! It was a terrible experience that I will never forget.
customer_reviews.author: Rockinator

customer_reviews.title: Great for hip dysplasia
customer_reviews.text: I have a Maltese that was diagnosed with hip dysplasia at the age of 2. So he’s always had bad legs and joints. I’ve been giving this to him in combination with a keto/low carb diet and a few other supplements to reduce inflammation and the two have made such a difference! He’s almost 10 now and in better shape than when he was 6. He easily goes on longer walks, plays more, and you can just tell he’s in less pain. My dog doesn’t seem to mind it in his food at all and I like that it’s a liquid and easy to mix.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaCarlton

customer_reviews.title: Recommended surgery is no longer needed
customer_reviews.text: Mollie just turned 12 this summer. She is a 9 pound toy poodle. About 7 years ago, her doctor told me that she had a dislocated rear 'elbow' and that it was going to mean a surgical correction. We have had her on this supplement and a capsule of fish oil (that I have pierced and squirted into her food). The limping stopped shortly after we started on the fish oil. We only added this product about 3 years ago. She gets it on a daily basis. Long story short, she will never need the surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bryg

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent results with my dog
customer_reviews.text: I give this supplement morning and night with my dog’s food. The quality and effectiveness is inconsistent. They have explained that the their product sources cause color variations, but the product should have the same effectiveness. However, the lighter colored product is nowhere near as effective as the darker colored product. My dog has more issues with his hips with the lighter colored product and moves more freely, with fewer issues when the liquid is darker.
customer_reviews.author: Dagooaz

customer_reviews.title: Has formula changed?
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving this to my 12 yr old chihuahua for a year now and it does work. Also she likes the taste. But in the bottle I received this week. There was a thick paste like glob inside the top of the bottle. Even after shaking well and the liquid is much darker and thicker than before. My dog doesnt seem to like the taste anymore. Did I just get a bad bottle or has the formula changed. This supplement is rather expensive and doesn't do much good if she won't eat it
customer_reviews.author: Lins D

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 100lb Amstaff
customer_reviews.text: My dog is just over 100lbs and will be 9 this month. He has developed front wrist pain. This will be our second bottle but I do think we are just starting to see the benefits. I like that is it made in the USA and one of the highest concentrations of glucosamine, and if you have a big dog this is very important. Many other ones you have to give so much that you end up having to buy way more than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Advertised and proven
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to write my review just to make sure this product is good. I can say unequivocally that it works very well. I have two tiny dogs, under 4 lbs. and under 8 lbs. Based on printed measurements I made an educated guess at the amount to give them. Not only did they tolerate it exceptionally well but my under 4 lb Yorkie jumps up and down on chairs and not only runs but sprints. This will be my second purchase of a fine product. I also commend the developers of Hip and Joint for their excellent communicating skills and readiness to address any issues of which I had none.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Rosenwasser

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: We were on a hunt to find something possibly better than what we’ve been using. It rolled over so there was no time between their last glucosamine chews and this. Within two weeks, my 12 year old senior dog was struggling more to get up. Went back to the glucosamine chews and within days, she’s getting back to herself. Do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chanea

customer_reviews.title: Great product for dogs with arthritis, and joint discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Wow after 24 hours giving this to my yellow lab that recently tore his ACL in his right knee and has bad arthritis in his left knee was able to walk on both back legs. Usually he stops and sits down but today he acted as if he is well. I’ve been looking for something safe to give him that with help with inflammation, pain and stability. He didn’t even struggle getting off the floor. Awesome product! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Life changing!!! My Lola is only 3 years old, but had severe hip dysplasia 🥺. It was getting to the point she couldn't run and play at all without yelping from pain, and then would have to stop. I started her on this (I suggest 1/4 dose week 1-2, 1/2 dose following week, 3/4 dose the next, and then move to full dose), and after just a couple weeks, not even fully dosing, my puppers was already happier and more active! Now we're doing hours long hikes again, with no soreness or stiffness the next day. AND she's running, playing, and being silly again!!! 🙌🙌🙌 I HIGHLY recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Helped 15-year-old terrier with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is 14 and noticeably slowing down. She was hesitant to jump up onto the couch, and would occasionally stumble on the stairs. You could just tell she was hurting. Within a week of her using the supplements, there was a noticeable difference. We’ve been using it for a year now and I really think it’s helped make her more comfortable and improved joint health. She’s a 15 pound terrier and I just mix it into her food, she doesn’t seem to notice it’s there at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Hopes
customer_reviews.text: My hopes were high. I wanted Terra Max to help my buddy and I wanted to believe it was working. And through my eyes there was improvement. But my vet told me at best these products may keep his condition from getting worse. So I’m unsure it’s not obvious. He has good days but he also has bad days. If I had to make a call, I’d say it helped him so I’m going to keep giving it to him.
customer_reviews.author: FrankZ

customer_reviews.title: The product works, and the company cares
customer_reviews.text: I can not recommend this product more highly. My almost nine year old Sophie was not running up the stairs as she once did, and she had given up jumping from chair to chair or begging for her treats on her hind legs. It was sad for me watching her decline. I had tried other products with no noticeable gain when I noticed TerraMax, and as she is finicky about eating, the liquid was the ticket. After only a week, Sophie began running up the steps again, and by the next week, she was jumpingand her former energetic self. A Miracle product and the company answered my every email and concern. Happy I Am!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Solomons epting

customer_reviews.title: Showing definite signs of improvement by week 5!
customer_reviews.text: We started our 8 yr old Bull Terrier on this product the 1st of December. He was showing great discomfort in one shoulder. We had been giving him a prescription for pain for quite some time, but I wanted to find something to heal or help mend the current problem (if nothing else, eliminate further discomfort and damage). There is definitely a difference in our daily walk routine. He used to only be able to handle 1 trip around the park, sometimes we even had to take a short cut; by week 5, he's ready for a 2nd trip around the park. We just re-ordered and plan to keep him on this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri K - Tulsa

customer_reviews.title: Great product! It works!
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs who are approaching ‘senior’ dog status. One has bad knees, the other has creaky hips. They had been on a different hip & joint supplement when a friend highly recommended the Terra Max Pro. We decided to switch and give it a try. We are on our third bottle, and the dogs are moving much more easily, and I see them playing in the yard a lot more than they had been. They’ve even jumped up to catch balls a few times! I recommend this product for keeping your dog’s joints supple, no matter what age they are.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Kept my dog going until the very end!
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for our senior golden retriever for the last four years of her life. It was not until the last month of her life that we needed to also add in arthritis medication. I fully credit this supplement with keeping her going for so long! I highly recommend it, and will be giving it to my other dog as soon as he hits his senior years.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ott

customer_reviews.title: Small dogs with esophageal narrowing
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 small Maltese, and two of them have had significant problems with a narrowed trachea (which is very common with small dogs).Previously they had coughing, wheezing and appeared to be unable at times to take a breath, My vet suggested to give them this supplement as the trachea is mostly cartilage. I have had them on this supplement for about 6 months and all symptoms have almost completely disappeared. I am very pleased. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 12 year old Weimaraner/lab we have been using the product on and off for 3 years now. We definitely notice a difference when she is continually using the product. She is less stiff. It is even more critically shince she injured her knee.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical of this product to start as my dog has been getting older and no longer even wanted to go out more than once a day to go to the bathroom. I didn't know what would help with her joints so I decided to try this. After the first week, she was going out twice a day. After two, she was running again and after four she was playing tug of war. I was amazed and will be ordering this for her again in the future. One thing: refrigerate it after opening!
customer_reviews.author: Littlereaper

customer_reviews.title: Dogs (don't necessarily) love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'd always said that our dog would eat anything that wasn't nailed down. The product label claims, "Dogs Love It". Until he we gave him this supplement, our dog ate anything we gave him. He eats the supplement now, but only after it soaks into a couple dog biscuits over night in the frig. Makes it kind of a pain to get it into him. Did it work for him? No, but that's not necessarily a reflection on the effectiveness of the product. We'll find out from the vet why this senior rescue dog is gimpy. We only tried it to see if it would help, but it could be he had an old injury.
customer_reviews.author: Lainy

customer_reviews.title: Works very well...
customer_reviews.text: TerraMax seems to be helping tremendously with our new rescue dog. We recently adopted a senior old girl from a sanctuary where the owner died. Reba is 13+ and very arthritic. At first she did good just getting around the house and outside to do her duties. Yesterday she went for a short walk around the block and has a spring in her step. She moves around so much better since starting on TerraMax.
customer_reviews.author: pamela w

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I just adopted a 6 year old mastiff last month and they had him on rimadyl which I wasn't crazy about. Between giving him great food everyday AND this liquid on his food morning and evening, he no longer needs the rimadyl. He's even running, well, for a mastiff it's more like prancing, with his siblings. I highly recommend this product! I also give it to my 3-legged, 7 year old pit mix and it really seems to help her.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lunder

customer_reviews.title: Love this it's easy
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars, but can't afford. Love this it's easy. Dogs liked too. Love the ingredients. But have switched back to something less expensive, a powder. Same ingredients, just the powder is more difficult to add in to the food, as I mix with water and half to stir well. I have an english mastiff, a great dane and a saint dane. This product only lasted me almost 3 weeks, at half dosage. No way can I afford this for my giant breed dogs. So even though this is great, back to the $8 powder it is, which lasts me 6 weeks full dosage.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Helped my Service Dog
customer_reviews.text: This product was a great support to my very active service dog. My service dog goes everywhere with me and is worked ALOT!!! I use this joint supplement along with their other version (the concentrated formula in the green bottle). I use less that way of the expensive bottle, which helps save me money since their products are so pricy (worth the money, but still very expensive for my budget). My dog loves it and it really seems to help him feel better, support his hips and have more energy. Customer service is amazing and very helpful with dosage and any other questions you might have. Thank you TerraMax pro for helping support my service dog as he supports me.
customer_reviews.author: Kuno

customer_reviews.title: Great for aging dottie with injury and arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product when my 9 year old rottweiler tore his cranial cruciate ligament. He also has a bad hip and the beginnings of arthritis. This liquid formula is easy to mix into daily food. Seems to have helped his recovery and mobility so I now give it to my 5 year old active pit mix as well.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: an older Great Dane who intermittently limps
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this specifically for one of my dogs, an older Great Dane who intermittently limps. All mine are on supplements but he needed something more and this came well recommended. I've added it to the regimen for two others, as well. I think it's been helping but the reason I only gave 4 stars is that, realistically, measuring out this liquid is haphazard, inefficient and imprecise. There has to be a better way of delivering this product with more accuracy. I think you should either add a marked syringe based on weight or a much smaller pour spout. So much gets wasted trying to get appropriate amounts into a teaspoon for giant dogs and small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: ckarr2

customer_reviews.title: Frisky again
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been on terra max pro for about 4 weeks. She has improved in energy and mobility. She still has a slight limp in her right leg, but she is now bringing me her toys and playing with the. Cat: things she hadn't done for months. She is a 13 year old Australian Shepard and I am delighted to see her perk up. She has never noticed there is something new in her food, so I guess it tastes ok. Thank you terra max. I have just ordered my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Seeking Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this product, he would notice if we didn't add it to his food, and wait for it. After a few weeks we did notice a improvement. He is 14 year old lab with terrible arthritis, this is by no way a cure, but he needed less anti-inflammatory meds and had a little extra spring in his step again. We tried the advanced formula (green bottles) they offered thinking it may even improve him more, but sadly he didn't like the taste of it, and refused to eat it. We returned it, and reordered 2 bottles of this formula. The company is very wonderful to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: SallySueInPa

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for your dog
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I have an older dog whose knee goes out sometimes. Always looks so sad when it happens as he cannot keep up with his buddies. I tried this and game changer. He has done amazing on it. I am always giving it away to my friends and with any dogs I adopt out - I am a small dog foster based rescue. Everyone raves about it.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! I have a 13 year old German ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I have a 13 year old German Shepard with horrible bones and joints that make it very difficult for him to get up from laying down or sitting! This product has been tremendous help I do see results! You do need to keep up with it and make sure to continue to give to your dog if you want it to work! This with CBD oil has helped him up so much from getting up to walking I see a big difference!
customer_reviews.author: Zenaida

customer_reviews.title: 12-Year old puppy thanks to TerraMax!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen good results with my 12-Year old Lab mix, Max after starting him on TerraMax twice per day around 2years ago. He doesn’t like the taste, so I have to disguise with wet food and beef broth, but worth it for how well it works. Prior to starting on TerraMax he was getting gimpy and was unable to jump up on people (which was a good thing but bad sign for his hips). Soon after we began him on TerraMax he was jumping up again and his hip mobility greatly improved. He’s like a 12 year old puppy now! Thanks TerraMax!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Allen

customer_reviews.title: try to give it after eats so doesnt upset tummy
customer_reviews.text: finally found something i can get my dog to eat. I just put it on a tbsp and he licks it off. I had tried a bunch of chews he wouldnt eat any of them. he loves this. It has everything he needs for joint supplement i compared the ingredients from some prescription chews the vet charged me $59 for that i couldnt get him to eat no matter what i did.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Must have for older dogs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 10y/o lab tore both of her ACL's within the same year. After various vet opinions we decided to forgo surgery. Much rest lead to beginning our morning walks again but sadly we tapped out after a block or two with significant limping. We began this supplement and after four weeks the limping stopped and we now go on daily two mile walks that usually includes a swim in the intracoastal, with no more limping!!! She has more energy and excitement than she had before her injury. Great great product, worth every penny! She loves the taste too!
customer_reviews.author: KateBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Definitely reordering!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the Terramax Pro hip and joint suppliment twice a day for about a month, and notice easier movement, more energetic and all around happier 7 1/2 yr old dog. When we purchased the suppliment we weren't sure if it would work for Dakota, but it was i liquid form and had higher amounts of each suppliment the any of the other products we tried so we thought it couldn't hurt to give it a try. We are very happy with the results and will definitely reorder and continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: mcourter

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My pups are all under 5 years of age, so they get the supplement as a proactive measure as none of them have mobility problems. My macaw,24 hours on the other hand, moves much more rapidly and easily when she gets her TerraMax. I see the difference and she feels it.
customer_reviews.author: Yes ManTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: More than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This product has done wonders for our dog. His hip isn't as sore. He still limps a little. He loves to go on walks. Our Rufus has always suffered with a chapped nose. When we put lotion on it, the scabs peel off leaving it bloody. But after we started giving him TerraMax his nose has cleared up on its own. It still isn't as good as a retriever, but it's much better. Also he sheds less. That is always nice for an inside dog. We will continue to use TerraMax.
customer_reviews.author: katlarue

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great supplement for my lab!! He was starting to show signs of his age (10 years old) and starting to have hip problems. I have been giving him this daily and it definitely seems to be helping with his mobility; he can get up and down stairs again. Also, his coat is not shedding near as bad so that means I don't have to vacuum daily like I was having to do. I would definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Results
customer_reviews.text: It has been one month today since starting to give two of four of our dogs Terramax Hip & Joint Supplement. Jack, our eleven year old Westie had some real problems in the joints of his back legs. Buddy, our three year old rescue mix has a deformed spine which causes him severe pain at times. Medications and treatment (expensive) helped, but the problems continued. Unbelievably, after ten days of the Hip and Joint supplement, we could see major improvement in the mobility of both dogs. Now, after one month, both dogs show no discomfort and are moving normally. It's wonderful to see them running and playing. What a great product. Thank you Terramax
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bowton

customer_reviews.title: Took a while, but...
customer_reviews.text: Some say their dog didn't like the taste of this. Mine didn't either, but because I'd spent this much on such a huge bottle I was determined to get it down him anyway, lol. He eventually got used to the taste I guess, because he gobbles his food down now. It took a while to get there though. I thought I might try a different brand/form or at least get a smaller bottle if someone had it, but I guess I'll just stick with this haha.
customer_reviews.author: Em D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results in 1 week; even better after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I had previously been using a tablet form of joint medicine for my 10 year Swiss Mountain dog which provided him some relief. But Terra Max Pro Liquid is amazing. He now runs around the yard and engages in play with our two younger dogs. Update: It's now been a month. The Terra Max Pro Liquid is awesome! My 10 year old is able to run and play for much longer. He even gets up and down easier. I started putting it on his food but he doesn't always eat twice a day. So I changed to mixing it with a sd mall amount of water. He loves it like this and I am sure he gets every drop.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey D.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Supplements!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 year old Chihuahua who started having joint problems where her knees would pop out involuntarily when she would walk. She started to run less and whine if I took her on walks. I initially got her the H3 Essentials treats with glucosamine since she loves treats, but she wouldn't eat them. So I bought this stuff and just put it in her water. At first she wouldn't drink it unless she was really thirsty, but now she drinks it just fine! After about a week, she was running again, jumping, wanting to go on walks, etc. Its like she is herself again! I will definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for Older Dogs
customer_reviews.text: After having my now 14 year old border collie on another supplement for over a year with no apparent improvement, I switched to terramax pro. He's getting 1 tablespoon twice daily, and after 5-6 weeks I have noticed an improvement in his ability to get in and out of the house. While I am not expecting miracles at his age, I'm all for something that will provide some measure of improvement in a dog's quality of life and this supplement seemingly has done that. I'm also giving this to my 9 year old BC who hasn't yet shown signs of hip or joint issues.
customer_reviews.author: susan dicriscio

customer_reviews.title: Really seems to be helping my dog's hip dysplasia!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was recently diagnosed with severe hip dysplasia, and I have been researching supplements that were comparable to but more affordable than the ones prescribed by her vet. She has nearly completed the first bottle of this product, and is more active than she was before the diagnosis. The problem now is keeping her from jumping around when she wants to play!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Hard to dose
customer_reviews.text: Makes a mess out of the dog dishes. Have to use a measuring spoon to dose. It would be nice if the cap provided dosing. Didn’t last at all as long as I thought it would. Decided I would go back to my other product. I had been looking for a more beneficial dose of the medication for my large breed older dogs. This product didn’t meet my expectations. Also annoying that it has to be refrigerated
customer_reviews.author: Nio

customer_reviews.title: Works great after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for three months now, well I mean my Bichon has. Didn't notice any change in the first month, second week of second month I noticed he was limping less, as the month went on here was getting much better. On third month now and his limping has gone completely away, he's back running around like his old self, he's 13 now. I definitely recommend you try it.
customer_reviews.author: darren miller

customer_reviews.title: Good for Sharing
customer_reviews.text: I have my with morning coffee. Queen B, my giant poodle, has hers in her breakfast. We love them and can really feel the difference when we jog.
customer_reviews.author: T.Y. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Helped My Fur Baby!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually do a lot of reviewing, but I am very happy with TerraMax Pro. Before I started giving it to my 8-yr-old pit/lab mix, she was limping with every step and holding her left rear leg off the floor most of the time. After a month or so, I notice a significant difference. She rarely limps and usually walks on her bad hip/leg. This isn't the first supplement I tried, but it is certainly the one that worked. Thanks for helping my fur baby have less discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: This Stuff is the real Deal , especially if you're baby is a pickup eater, within days we have noticed amazing improvement and not just in mobility but her mood she's got energy , she's happy, but most importantly she's not in pain , I know it's expensive but , you get what you pay for, and Im happy to pay for a product as good as this
customer_reviews.author: michael allen

customer_reviews.title: This Product Was A Godsend
customer_reviews.text: My Wire Fox Terrier is over 14 years old. I was saddened and heartbroken to see him having difficulty standing from a lying position and jumping. I couldn't get any supplements in pill form, he wasn't having any of that. I followed the instructions for the loading dose for 4 weeks and saw amazing results! He is agile again and more importantly appears pain free. This product was a Godsend for Wiley and me!
customer_reviews.author: Wendell W.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve definitely noticed a positive difference in my dog. She’s 11, and had been limping consistently on her left front leg. After 2 weeks of loading dose, the limp is gone or, if she’s very tired, almost imperceptible. I’m placing another order today and plan to keep her on it for life. Plus, she’s s super picky eater and doesn’t even seem to notice this on her food!
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: works great and very fast!
customer_reviews.text: received this on Sunday. started my arthritic husky on it with dinner. last night he GOT UP ON THE BED! something he hasnt been able to do in months. he loves to go on walks, but it has been difficult and painful for him to just get around the block. today we made it around 2 blocks! dont really want to start him on prescription meds. very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: isabella vida

customer_reviews.title: This product has helped our dog tremendously!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! One of my long haired dachshunds has had some issues with his back, and has been taking this product for almost a month now. Within one week after taking the product regularly we saw a positive difference and he just seems to be doing better every day. He appears to be a no discomfort whatsoever now. My other long-haired dachshund as well as a rescue mix breed pup of ours are taking this product as well. I would highly recommend this product for any dog but especially dogs that have a tendency for predisposition to back issues – I feel it's a very important part of what should be there daily supplement/feeding routine.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helped my huskies' mobility.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my dogs on dasuquin for years now and decided to try this instead. My huskies are 7 & 8 years old with some some leg stiffness and less than smooth gait these days. However, I noticed that within two weeks of using this they seem to be moving better and are not as stiff when they walk or run. The only reason this got 4 stars instead of 5 is the delivery method. It's difficult to pour out of this bottle without spilling constantly - would be great if it had a pump or squeeze top instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog actually eats
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty good. My pup won't eat any chews with this type of medicine in it, but he will eat this version when we pour over his food. If you're having issues with your dog eating any of the chews your vet recommends, I would recommend trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Gotta a stiff limping doggy YOU NEED THIS THEN!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works miracles. My rescue doggy is middle aged and was starting to be stiff walking when getting up. I starting putting a tsp. In his dinner and he is no longer walking stiff from getting up from a laying position. He's even jumping up on the couch too. This bottle last forever too. It's almost time to reorder which I will do because THIS STUFF WORKS!!
customer_reviews.author: DARBYS MOM

customer_reviews.title: Saw results within two weeks!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was kind of sceptic about the Terra-Max Hip and Joint liquid, may work on my 8 year old and 24 lb Havanese. To my surprise I will say that the improvement was within a week, he is not limping or holding his right hind leg! He is progressively exercising and walking much better. Again is only a couple of weeks, looking forward to seeing him walking 4 or 5 miles with me again.
customer_reviews.author: Masserati58

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware !!! Although it looks like your getting 3 bottles your getting only 1
customer_reviews.text: The way this is advertised, on the Amazon page, it is pictured showing 3 bottles. This product is super expensive although for my dog's health I would not blink an eye if it worked. The photo showing 3 bottles is VERY deceiving as that is what you think you will receive. True I should have read the description better but from a fast look it seemed good for my dog so I bought it. As well there is no phone number on the bottle to call the manufacturer if you have a problem such as their money back guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Greenstein

customer_reviews.title: no change!
customer_reviews.text: used hole bottle. no change in walking or getting up or down. I injected in mouth as not to loose any in food not eaten.
customer_reviews.author: VMAX

customer_reviews.title: I have had him on Flexicose and decided to order this to see if he did good with it
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying this product for 3 weeks now. I do not see a change in my dog at all. I have had him on supplements before for his joints which worked well after 1 week. I have had him on Flexicose and decided to order this to see if he did good with it. Not the case so I order 6 bottles of Flexicose. I am not saying this is not a great product, it just doesn't work for my giant schnauzer.
customer_reviews.author: Carlsbad, NM

customer_reviews.title: Hit or Miss
customer_reviews.text: We like others, have noticed a variance in consistency. The darker thicker product produced very noticeable results. The lighter gave no results whatsoever. The third bottle was back to being darker and produced positive results. We are 3/4 through our 4th bottle that is the palest yet, seemingly water and our dogs are declining. Disappointing !
customer_reviews.author: deenmorg

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading the reviews and buy this.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 9+ year old weiner dogs, and the larger of the 2 had been limping for the past year or so. We tried different supplements and foods and treatments, but none worked as well as this stuff does. They are like young girls again, and they run and jump and play! It's amazing, and not often that you find a miracle product that actually turns dogs' lives around. This is one of those products.
customer_reviews.author: Zak Hamill

customer_reviews.title: It's not cheap but it actually works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. Our 7 year old GSP has arthritis in his shoulder and our vet recommended it. There are still days where he starts limping because he runs too much but other than that you can tell after the first week he felt much better.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware of use~
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this product should show in the pictures Provided of label that product can not be used for pets that are pregnant or have urinary issues. I tried the search in the provided fyi and nothing was shown. The above medical issues would denote not buying. This Product.
customer_reviews.author: NANA

customer_reviews.title: My pug is having stable walk
customer_reviews.text: My pug was not walking properly. As my friend recommended this product, I have been giving this supplement in addition to Salmon Oil. Now, my pug is healthy and has no problem walking anymore. I will continue providing this product to my pug.
customer_reviews.author: AGrg

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old Havanese...
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old Havanese has been suffering for a long time with arthritis in her front leg. It had gotten to the point of her just not wanting to walk anywhere and her limping just broke my heart. I've had her on fish oil for a long time, but it just wasn't helping. After reading the reviews here I decided to give this product a try. At almost the 4 week mark I'm starting to see a bit of difference as her limp does look a little less severe. I look forward to the coming weeks as I watch her improve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worked for my small senior dogs!
customer_reviews.text: IMPRESSED and happy. My fur baby was struggling walking on 3 legs. After spending a large chunk of money at Veterinian only to be told only thing Vet could do was therapy at an estimated cost of $1500, I decided to research a bit. Everything I read kept bringing up glucosamine. Decided to try THIS product and a month later, my fur baby is walking on all 4 with such a slight limp it’s hardly noticeable, only to me since I’ve had him for 15 yrs. Mine is a small terrier breed under 12 lbs. It worked, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Prado

customer_reviews.title: ... had another brand I purchased and my older dog hated it. I added it to his food but ...
customer_reviews.text: I had another brand I purchased and my older dog hated it. I added it to his food but that did not matter. It did help him but hated that he did not like it. I looked at all of the reviews and decided to purchase this. He eats the food without a problem and I do notr think he even knows it is in there. It is also much stronger which I like and was very similar in price to the other. I will definitely get this again. I believe I can already tell a difference in the way he feels.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Seeing results in one month!
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed my 14 year old Bichon has increased mobility and doesn't limp as much as he used to. He still loves to go for his walk everyday and he actually can walk up to a mile now, which he couldn't do before. He also has less accidents in the house, I think he was just in too much pain to make it to the door!
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: This has made a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Auggie is almost 10 and has had both knee's repaired and just seems sluggish and uncomfortable much of the time. Since we started giving this, he has been more than happy to go for walks, and actually has been running, something he seldom does. He just seems more comfortable now, so we're just going to continue it.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works better than Flexadin!
customer_reviews.text: Better than Flexadin recommended by vet! My schoodle has severe hip arthritis and after reading review I thought I would give this a try. Before taking Terramax he would yelp sometimes when getting up. As crazy as it sounds - I think he was better after only a few days on Terramax! He has not yelped not once since mixing this stuff in his food. I will say however he isn’t crazy about the taste but doesn’t hate it either so I mix with his food and he seems to care at all. Truly I am amazed at the difference it’s made for my dog!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Sandel

customer_reviews.title: It really works for my Welsh corgi. I will continuely buy it for my fury family.
customer_reviews.text: This is really good products. I bought it for my 6 years old Welsh Corgi, who has limp on her rear leg. She got long body but short legs. I really worry about her legs. So I bought Hip and Joint Supplement. It really works! After continually use it, she can jump to bed again. I can't believe it. So I purchased it again. And I will recommend this item to all my friends. Please go and try it, you will see the different. Also the reason I choose it, I do the research, liquid is easier for dog to absorb, compare to others.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We've been giving our dogs glucosamine in pill form and it has upset one of our dog's stomachs, so we thought we'd give this a try. I feel we don't give our dog as much compared to pill form and it has the same effect because it's concentrate. It's a little on the expensive side for up front costs, but I think with the smaller dosage it evens out over time. We mix it in with their food and they lap it up. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving this to my two terrier mixes for 3 days, and I don't know what's in this stuff but WOW! Chewy has bad allergies and gets irritated on his belly and he just scratches away. This along with Zesty Paw's Aller-Immune Bites has worked wonders!
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: After Just One week leg has vastly improved.
customer_reviews.text: My little dog has a trick knee, and I am afraid to put her through surgery she is only 4 years old, and has already had surgery on one of her legs.....a week ago she was using three legs, and now she mostly uses four, so I would attribute this to a product well made. Leaving room for an extra star after she has been on it a month.
customer_reviews.author: Gail F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and company. Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and great company. The customer service is unbeatable and product works! Our 5 year old Lab was having issues with his arm or shoulder. He was limping on and off for a while and after eliminating a serious issue we decided to try a joint formula. I'm not kidding but he is better! We are out running and walking again this stuff really helped him. When we got the product it didn't have a label, I emailed the company and they sent us an additional bottle for free. Pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Brought me to tears - This product worked for US!
customer_reviews.text: Today was a tears of joy day. My Cooper (14 on Turkey day) has been suffering with his hindquarters and has barely been able to walk. I decided to try a new supplant in hopes it would make a difference. I just started the liquid Friday. Today my MIL sent me this video (I'm away on business) and my baby is nearly running. I can't tell you how excited that makes me and gives me some relief that some of the pain has subsided. This is the video she sent me. Sorry about the finger she is still learning her new iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and it seems to be as effective if not better. I have found two more bottles of my ...
customer_reviews.text: It really has helped, we had been on another liquid supplement for my dog and they were out, so I tried this. He loves it and it seems to be as effective if not better. I have found two more bottles of my other stuff and once that runs out, I will reorder. Thank you TerraMax.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell it's working great. I have a one year old chocolate lab puppy. A ligament in her knee keeps coming out of place causing her to be in pain and limping to me. I have been giving Liquid Gloucosamine for about a month and a half. She appears to be doing better. Don't know what the long term results will be, but for now it's working. I will continue to purchase this product for her. I used this product on my senior lab - I believe it extended his life to a point he had arthritis very severely. He just passed away about a month ago, he was 16years old.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTY S. WOLF-WESTFALL

customer_reviews.title: I got good results!
customer_reviews.text: I started giving this product to my rescue dog who is now around 14-15? years old. He is showing signs of stiffness in his back legs. He has been much more active and even frisky since I started giving him this product! I am enjoying seeing the positive results. Plus this company personally reaches out to you to find out how your dog is doing. I appreciate that very much!
customer_reviews.author: laurie R

customer_reviews.title: ... or so with my German-Chou dogs and it's really good to the point that I'll buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Yes I've being using using this product for the last month or so with my German-Chou dogs and it's really good to the point that I'll buy it again. I could notice a change four days after as many people said in other comments my dog somehow jumped no and off a big table I have in my backyard and by doing so she kind of dislocated a leg I'll be using this product for the rest of her days...!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eleazar La Palma

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely satisfied with the customer service of TerraMax and the product ...
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with the customer service of TerraMax and the product tool. I doubled the dose as per directions for the first 6 weeks and my Malti-poo has stopped limping after resting on his right rear leg. He tore his crucial tendon in his knee a year ago and thru acupuncture and rest he has healed but still limped after resting on his leg. Clearly he was in pain ! I am ordering another bottle and have told all my Pet Friends of the benefit of this product. Love love love this and Bailey does too:)
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great support
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed to help and customer service was great. Our 9 year old Irish Terrier had a limp on his left rear leg. Nothing structurally wrong most likely something like a connecting ligament. He avoided putting his full weight on it. After a couple of days on TerraMax the limp was gone. Always difficult to tell cause and effect but it certainly seemed to be beneficial. I administer 2 teaspoons with a syringe in the mouth once in the morning. I initially doubled up to 'pre load' his system for about a week. In addition to the active ingredients it has pure Aloe Vera which is a plus. Finally, customer service was superb. They really seem to care.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Brodzik

customer_reviews.title: My 10+ Year Old Lab Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoys the flavor of this. We do notice if we skip a few days (especially in winter) of giving it to him, he seems more stiff. Two days of back on the supplement and he is leaping around like a puppy. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: luvnlife

customer_reviews.title: Dogs of all ages
customer_reviews.text: I have given this to my dogs for many years. They seem to do really well for their ages. I will keep purchasing. I give once a day in the am to my small elderly dog and once a day in the am to my 4 year old retriever.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Caused severed diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: This gave my dog severe diarrhea within a couple hours of taking it. Twice! (I had to do an elimination process to determine the cause). And then they charged me $7.60 to return it. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: ATK

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service! Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Samson loved the taste and had no problem getting it down. For a while we were using a large syringe and squirting it on his food and he would try to just drink it right from the syringe. For easier storage prep, we put it in a ball jar with a squirt pump. Sam is a 100lb akita/boxer mix who's also on Derramax. TerraMax has OUTSTANDING customer service and has been following up with us on Sam's health! Since he wasn't responding to this formula, TerraMax recommended the advanced formula and even provided a complimentary bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Golden thinks it's mighty tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old Golden Retriever who has hip dysplasia. This is more of a preventative supplement because he does not have a lot of pain yet, so I haven't noticed much of a difference in his movement. However, my dog absolutely LOVES the taste of this stuff and does a big happy dance at meal times now. My only real complaint is the bottle design. The way the bottle is shaped does not make for easy pouring so it is extremely messy. The fish oil supplement that is also made by TerraMax comes with a pump which is SO much more convenient - TerraMax should consider something similar for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Courteney

customer_reviews.title: Sr Dog Rescue and picky eater approved
customer_reviews.text: We use this one and the extra concentrate Our lab is turning 14 in a couple weeks. With the help of this and natural anti inflammatories, he is still running his favorite 2 mile loop. He’s a picky eater but loves the taste of this on his kibble.
customer_reviews.author: reeinsf

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work pretty well
customer_reviews.text: For the moment, I'm giving this stuff four stars. I've been using at full dose it for my Great Pyr Hugo for roughly 5 months now. He seems to be doing much better, as his ease of movement seems more fluid. He is 9 years old, and has arthritis and elbow dysplasia and this supplement seems to have helped him. Admittedly more than I thought it might. I'll see where we are with 9 - 12 months of use. I'm hoping his progress continues. He's doing well with limited walks (30 - 50 min) on flat surfaces, and even some gently rolling hills on the trails. I hope to see his progress continue.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs will eat this willingly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this type of supplement at my vet's recommendation - and based on experience with hyaluronic acid in horses. To date, I'd say it's working since we've had no recurrence of shoulder problems. What's remarkable to me is that I have a finicky eater - and he seems to love this! Keep up the good work -
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Our Jack Russell almost 16 is years old. She had some shaking in her legs that was getting worse. I have been using this product for about a year. In less than a month her shaking started to diminish. Her shaking is now only occasional and only lasts a few minutes. She likes the taste and eagerly waits for me to give it to her. Her energy is high and I believe it is because of this Joint Supplement. I had tried others products and they did not help. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for my senior dog
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it has something to do with the 'light colored' liquid vs the dark colored liquid (dark being better is what reviewers say) and I received the light colored liquid, after 2 months have to report it did nothing for my dog. He is old and has some limping at times, and this did nothing to help him.
customer_reviews.author: pkwhisker

product_meta.title: TerraMax Pro Best Hip and Joint Supplement for Dogs - Liquid Glucosamine w/Chondroitin MSM and Hyaluronic Acid - Extra Strength - Safe Natural Arthritis Pain Relief - Made in USA - 32oz
product_meta.description:
Is Your Dog Suffering from Joint Pain?

It's difficult to see your dog start to slow down as he grows older! But a few teaspoons a day of TerraMax Pro's glucosamine for dogs can change all that.

...TONS of dog owners are experiencing the POWER of TerraMax Pro Hip and Joint Support... and now you can too!

We GUARANTEE your dog is going to experience less discomfort, less pain, increased mobility and better overall health or you get ALL your money back!

TerraMax Pro's Extra Strength Hip & Joint Formula contains an unmatched 1600 mg of Glucosamine Hcl, 1200 mg of Chondroitin Sulfate and 1000 mg of Opti-MSM for PROVEN results.

Glucosamine, Chondroitin and Opti-MSM are natural substances that help maintain the health and resiliency of joints and connective tissues, while promoting general good health. Liquid supplements are PROVEN to absorb more quickly & efficiently than tablets, offering better & faster results.

* SUPERIOR VALUE, lasts longer than other formulas.
* 62% MORE Glucosamine than other formulas
* 50% MORE Chondroitin than other formulas
* Contains OPTI-MSM, tested at OVER 1000 TIMES greater sensitivity than regular MSM
* Ultra PURIFIED and DISTILLED to provide the PUREST form of sulfur needed for structural integrity of joint cartilage.

The PROVEN science behind our product makes it truly unmatched! Our proprietary formulation means a 100% Unmatched Experience - backed by our Unconditional 100% Money-Back Guarantee!

Try it now, keep your dog active, healthy and happy! Click the Add to Cart button above to improve your dogs quality of life!
feature_bullets: VETERINARIAN RECOMMENDED! Superior Absorption. Better results. Convenient & Tasty Formula Dogs Love!
100% PURE, SAFE AND ALL NATURAL! Made in USA using only the BEST HUMAN GRADE INGREDIENTS AVAILABLE!
MAXIMUM HIP & JOINT SUPPORT! Repairs and Supports Joints and Cartilage to Help Maintain Mobility!
POWERFUL FORMULA Improves Skin Problems, Stomach Ailments, Inflammation, Wound Healing, Incontinence
UNCONDITIONAL 100% LOVE IT OR GET ALL YOUR MONEY BACK SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! TRY IT RISK FREE NOW!
